entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
